trans-unit.source: Represents security information for client application services, which includes role information.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta le informazioni di sicurezza per i servizi delle applicazioni client, che include le informazioni sui ruoli.

trans-unit.source: When you validate a user in client application services, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> or the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Quando si convalida un utente in servizi delle applicazioni client, il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>Imposta il `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà a un'istanza di questa classe.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>Inizializza la <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>proprietà di una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity>classe.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object returned by the `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>Inizializza il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>proprietà per il <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>oggetto restituito dal `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: You will not typically access this class directly.
trans-unit.target: Non si accederà in genere questa classe direttamente.

trans-unit.source: Normally, you will call the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> returned by the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: In genere, si chiamerà il <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>metodo il <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>restituito dal `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you can cast the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property value to a ClientRolePrincipal reference to call the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method explicitly, as demonstrated in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, è possibile eseguire il cast di <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>valore della proprietà da un riferimento ClientRolePrincipal per chiamare il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A>metodo in modo esplicito, come illustrato nella sezione esempio.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property is initialized with the value of the `identity` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>il valore della proprietà viene inizializzata la `identity` parametro.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you validate a user in client application services, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> or the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Quando si convalida un utente in servizi delle applicazioni client, il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>Imposta il `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà a un'istanza di questa classe.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>Inizializza la <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>proprietà di una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity>classe.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object returned by the `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>Inizializza il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>proprietà per il <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>oggetto restituito dal `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: Represents the current user.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta l'utente corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the security identity associated with the <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'identità di sicurezza associato il <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you validate a user in client application services, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> or the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Quando si convalida un utente in servizi delle applicazioni client, il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>Imposta il `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà a un'istanza di questa classe.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the Identity property to a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>Inizializza la proprietà Identity per una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity>classe.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the Identity property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object returned by the `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>Inizializza la proprietà Identity per il <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>oggetto restituito dal `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: Represents the current user.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta l'utente corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user represented by the <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"></xref> is in the specified role.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'utente rappresentato dal <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"> </xref> è nel ruolo specificato.

trans-unit.source: Normally, you will call the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> returned by the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: In genere, si chiamerà il <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>metodo il <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>restituito dal `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you can cast the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property value to a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> reference to call this method explicitly, as demonstrated in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, è possibile eseguire il cast di <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>valore della proprietà da un <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>riferimento per chiamare questo metodo in modo esplicito, come illustrato nella sezione esempio.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IsInRole method will always return `false` if the user login has expired.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo IsInRole restituirà sempre `false` se l'accesso utente è scaduto.

trans-unit.source: This will not occur if your application calls the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method one time shortly after authentication.
trans-unit.target: Ciò non si verifica se l'applicazione chiama il <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>metodo una volta subito dopo l'autenticazione.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application must retrieve user roles at other times, you might want to add code to revalidate users whose login has expired.
trans-unit.target: Se l'applicazione deve recuperare ruoli utente in altri casi, potrebbe essere si desidera aggiungere il codice per riconvalidare gli utenti il cui accesso è scaduto.

trans-unit.source: If all valid users are assigned to roles, you can determine whether the login has expired by calling the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Se tutti gli utenti validi sono assegnati ai ruoli, è possibile determinare se l'account di accesso è scaduto chiamando il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If no roles are returned, the login has expired.
trans-unit.target: Se viene restituito alcun ruolo, l'account di accesso è scaduto.

trans-unit.source: For an example of this functionality, see the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio di questa funzionalità, vedere il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: This functionality is only necessary if you have selected **Require users to log on again whenever the server cookie expires** in your application configuration.
trans-unit.target: Questa funzionalità è necessaria se sono stati selezionati solo **richiedere agli utenti di accedere di nuovo a ogni scadenza del cookie del server** nella configurazione dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedura: configurare i servizi dell'applicazione Client](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The role to check.
trans-unit.target: Il ruolo da controllare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is in the specified role; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the user is not in the specified role or is not authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'utente è nel ruolo specificato. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se l'utente non è nel ruolo specificato o non è autenticato.
